text: 2.28-29 Lo 30.6, Jon 7.24, 8.39, Lom 9.6-7, 1 Ko 4.5, 2 Ko 10.18, Kol 2.11, 1 Pi 3.4 Nɨgɨm. Bɨ wak kɨlop tɨbɨlɨkɨpal ak, kɨlop gek bɨ Juda yɨbɨl yenɨgel tek ma lup. Pen abe, bɨ wak kɨlop tɨbɨlɨkɨpal ak, tap wak ak nep mel. Ak pen, bɨ Juda olap, ne Juda gos teplep kɨli ak nab ayaŋ nep yonɨmuŋ, ne bɨ Juda nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak mɨdeb. Pen bɨ wak nop tɨbɨlɨkup nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak, anɨb abe bɨ gos nab ne ayaŋ nep yonɨmuŋ. Bɨ wak nop tɨbɨlɨkup nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl anɨb ak, takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨdek gɨl gɨtep gin agɨl gos ma nɨgɨnɨmuŋ. Bɨ wak nop tɨbɨlɨkup nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl ak, God Kawnan ne ke nop gup. Gup anɨb ak, binɨb ogɨnap nɨgel yɨb ma mɨdeb, God pen nop nɨgek yɨb mɨdeb.
